stocks.note: *Numbers as of market close on Feb 6th
stocks.news: Markets rebounded strongly on Friday, with all major indices posting solid gains heading into the Super Bowl weekend.

economy.commentary: Treasury yields climbed slightly as investors assess economic data and Fed policy outlook. Gold continued its strong performance, while silver saw impressive gains recovering from recent losses.

crypto.commentary: Bitcoin and Ethereum posted strong weekend trading gains, recovering from recent declines. The crypto market showed renewed strength as weekend liquidity improved and sentiment shifted more positive.

real_estate.commentary:
Market Status (Feb 7): Strong Seller's Market
‚Ä¢ Inventory Update: Inventory has ticked up slightly to 56 active listings as of this morning, but demand remains high with a Market Action Index of 67 (out of 100).
‚Ä¢ Median List Price: Currently hovering around $1.65 million.
‚Ä¢ Affordable Housing Opportunity: The City of Fremont has a notable "Below Market Price" (BMP) opportunity open right now. A brand-new townhome on Fremont Blvd is available for ~$364k for eligible income-qualified applicants. The deadline to apply is coming up on February 20, 2026, making this a key action item this weekend for first-time buyers.
‚Ä¢ Today's Open Houses (Examples):
  o New Construction: 43257 Newport Dr (5 bed, 4 bath) ‚Äî Listed at ~$3.3M.
  o Single Family: 34504 Willbridge Ter (3 bed, 3 bath) ‚Äî Listed at ~$1.85M.
  o Townhouse: 38860 Garibaldi Cmn ‚Äî Listed just under $1M ($965k), expected to draw heavy interest due to the sub-$1M price point.

üìç Fremont & Alameda County

The biggest real estate factor this weekend is logistics. With Super Bowl LX festivities dominating Santa Clara and overflow traffic affecting Milpitas and Fremont, real estate activity is experiencing a unique disruption:
‚Ä¢ Open House Logistics: While many open houses are proceeding as scheduled today, real estate agents are advising buyers to plan routes carefully to avoid traffic snarls around I-880 and Hwy 237.
‚Ä¢ Buyer Competition: Expect slightly thinner crowds at open houses today and tomorrow as casual lookers attend Super Bowl events (like the Tailgate at Great Mall). This offers a strategic window homes with less immediate competition.
